subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the fickle N.H.L. playoffs, the thrill of the top-seeded Capitals’ elimination stands in contrast to the reality that Alex Ovechkin’s season is over, too.
snippet: In the fickle N.H.L. playoffs, the thrill of the top-seeded Capitals’ elimination stands in contrast to the reality that Alex Ovechkin’s season is over, too.
